Name: Suli Fallen Harmony
About the game: Here, on this island, birds and humans live together in peace. It’s on the fishermen’s village that our hero, Suli, lives happily. As the elder’s assistant, the young bird works in the temple. One stormy night, he discovers a dark prophecy that will change his life forever. Discover the island, interact with colorful characters, in various places, solve many puzzle and bring back peace on Harmony ! A classical point and click game playable mainly with your mouse. An original 2D game with soft colors and hand painted backgrounds. A map to help you fast travel around the island. Some cutscenes with voice over. A story with many twists. 20 trophies to unlock along the game. Funny dialogs and endearing characters. A cute and mischievous hero to incarnate. Several mini games with various gameplays. Some easter eggs for our P&C games fans. First game produced by the Coutal Games team, Suli Fallen Harmony is an adventure that will please kids and adults. Do not hesitate, try it now !
